Sorry, just realized that was a DTD file I was opening. XML seems ok. 
Let's fix DTD (and verify others).

Looks like an order problem with the outline view part being created and
activated before the editor itself is fully initialized.
Is this one basically a dup of bug 87614?

Maybe similar, but this bug is about the *input* not having been set yet into
the editor.

Since I opened it, I'm changing to 'normal', but still high priority we need to 
get to the bottom of.

This no longer seems a problem (at least in 'head'), but will leave open 
a little longer to remember to invesigate fixing/moving some of the adapters.
